name: Endless Turn Up!!
description:
Feel the excitement and test your reflexes in Endless Turn Up !!, the exciting new zig zag race! If you love thrill and are a fan of the zigzag genre, you will surely love Endless Turn Up !!.

👆 SIMPLE CONTROLS
Check your ball and keep it on the zigzag course. Turn to the correct side with simple touches. React quickly and accurately, so you can collect diamonds that are on the way. Pedal for as long as possible on the zigzag road to get the highest score in this endless racing quest.

START NOW AND ENJOY:
- fun zigzag run
- simple tap controls
- a high score system of endless races
- clean and beautiful graphics and sound effects
- audio control (on / off)
- offline and one-handed play

Tap or click at the right moment to make the ball turn to next path.  Collect coins. One mistake and you die!  Simple as that!

👉 Download Endless Turn Up Now !!  It's FREE!
